location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, to Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter reports that a fleet of boats carrying coffee are on their way to Basra, that Meer Mahanna [Mīr Muhanna] has taken a large dingey belonging to the Sheikh of Bushire, and that a small boat has been captured off Carrack [Kharg]. An account of a pursuit of some of Mīr Muhanna's boats is also given.
